description.p: Passim is a daemon that allows other software to share metadata on your local network.
This release fixes the following bugs:

ul.li: Install the icons to the correct location

description.p: This release fixes the following bugs:

ul.li: Fix an almost-impossible resource leak when adding files

description.p: This release fixes the following bugs:

ul.li: Fix a crash when deleting items
Fix a small memory leak when parsing a request with duplicate arguments
Lock the systemd service down some more

description.p: This release adds the following features:

ul.li: Add a 'download' command to the CLI, and allow ignoring the localhost scan
Log to an audit log when publishing, unpublishing and sharing
Show the URI, auto-generated name, network and carbon saving in the CLI

description.p: This release fixes the following bugs:

ul.li: Add translation support for the CLI tool
Properly encode socket addresses, but disable IPv6 by default
Redirect with the basename set correctly
Reduce some log-spam when checking item ages

description.p: This release adds some new API for fwupd to use.

ul.li: Add passim_item_set_stream()

description.p: This release fixes the following bugs:

ul.li: Allow setting MaxItemSize bigger than 4GB
Do not abort with a critical warning when no query is used
Do not follow symlinks in libdir and sysconfpkgdir
Fix a harmless assertion warning when serving a zero-length file
Properly escape the Content-Disposition filename
Reduce RSS when reloading the daemon
Show a better message when publishing a file that is too large

description.p: Many thanks to Matthias Gerstner from the SUSE Security team for the code review.
This release fixes the following bug:

ul.li: Use a dedicated user to run the server

description.p: This release adds the following features:

ul.li: Add file size information into the exported item
Allow admins to add a directory of static contents

description.p: This release fixes the following bugs:

ul.li: Do not advertise files when on a metered network connection
Do not fail to start the service if /var/lib/passim/data does not exist
Explicitly depend on avahi-daemon in passim.service

description.p: This release fixes the following bugs:

ul.li: Sanity check share-count is less than share-limit
Show the correct age in the 'passim dump' CLI
